articles.description: TACOMA, Wash. – The Tacoma Pierce County Health Department announced on Sunday that they have discovered a case of a more contagious COVID-19 variant in Pierce County. The Washington State Department of Health notified Pierce County health officials of …

articles.title: Calif. COVID-19 vaccine recipient dies hours after being vaccinated - One America News Network
articles.description: Breaking News, Latest News and Current News from OANN.com. Breaking news and video. Latest Current News: U.S., World, Entertainment, Health, Business, Technology, Politics, Sports.
